title: Fix Select.Item empty value prop error in dress listings filters

requirements.text: Fix the Select.Item empty value prop error in the DressFilters component by ensuring all Select.Item components have non-empty string values for size, occasion, color, and city filters

quotes: A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string. This is because the Select value can be set to an empty string to clear the selection and show the placeholder.

acceptanceCriteria: All Select.Item components in DressFilters.tsx have non-empty value props
Filter dropdowns display placeholders correctly without throwing errors
Users can select filter options without encountering the Select.Item value error
Empty/default state is handled using undefined or null instead of empty strings

constraints: Do not modify the shadcn UI Select component source code
Maintain existing filter functionality and state management
Preserve the current filter options and behavior
nonGoals: Changing the filter UI layout or styling
